content.body: domfarolino: we don’t want to check the initial A, right?
annevk: right, but you’re saying we would? because at that time the algorithm was comparing location URL’s origin and request’s origin?
Hm I guess another issue is that it checks location URL before it is set
domfarolino: I’m not sure I understand what you’re getting at
annevk: Yeah sorry. Just trying to see why using the tainted origin flag is insufficient in the check you reviewed above.
